resources.string: Your answer is incorrect, try again.
1. A cross between a horse and a zebra is called a Hobra.
2. When the two numbers on opposite sides of a dice are added together it always equals 7.
3. In a deck of cards, the king has a mustache.
4. Hot and cold water sound the same when poured.
5. There are 14 bones in a human foot.
6. Goldfish have a two second memory.
8. Bananas are curved because they grow upwards towards the sun.
9. Venus is the hottest planet in the solar system.
